author: A_Brickset_user
title: Leaves a lot to be desired (as usual)
review: I bought this because I more or less needed more than 3 of much of the headgear in this set (plus I happened to be ordering something from lego.com anyway), but the other half I just couldn't use.  I wish they had thrown in better headgear in this.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: o0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0oo0oo0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0o0
review:
Everything you need to perfect any minifig! i always had a shortage of hair pieces and very few special headware, (mostly plain helmets and baseball caps), but after getting this all my townsfolk for my city and all my gangs and armies of lego are now perfected.
A great set for anyone wanting to make their minifigs better.(:

author: Berrus_Brickus
title: Wigs Galore
review: I got this set years ago, but retain little more than half of the original pieces included (mostly because my cousin borrowed them and "lost" them).  Nice variety though, incluedes rare colors maroon (was "lost" sadly), orange, blond (male spelling), and blonde (female spelling).  Also included are a few neck ties.  While mostly town centric, it has a few cowboy hats, parkas, bandanas, and Rock Raider helmets.
